title: Scan, Order, Savor: Implementing a QR-Code Based Point of Sale System for D'Home Makers Café
description: An innovative food café automation system that revolutionizes dining experiences through QR-code technology, enabling seamless ordering and payment processes based on table identification.
subtitle: Transforming Food Service with Smart QR-Code Technology

features.title: QR-Code Table Ordering
features.description: Customers scan unique QR codes at their tables to instantly access the digital menu and place orders directly from their smartphones.

features.title: Real-Time Order Management
features.description: Kitchen staff receive orders instantly with table identification, order status tracking, and preparation time estimates.

features.title: Contactless Payment Integration
features.description: Seamless payment processing through the system with multiple payment options and automated receipt generation.

features.title: Table Management System
features.description: Efficient table tracking with occupancy status, order history, and customer service optimization for café operations.
